body_html:
Tangential: I'm surprised you can reference tf.contrib.framework.arg_scope as tf.contrib.slim.arg_scope. We're going to have to do something about that. I filed #4950.

Maybe the is_training param should be deprecated on the vgg model and display a warning to use tf.contrib.framework.arg_scope instead. I'm going to mark this as contributions welcome if anyone wants to send us a PR with that cleanup. CC: @sguada
body_text:
Tangential: I'm surprised you can reference tf.contrib.framework.arg_scope as tf.contrib.slim.arg_scope. We're going to have to do something about that. I filed #4950.
Maybe the is_training param should be deprecated on the vgg model and display a warning to use tf.contrib.framework.arg_scope instead. I'm going to mark this as contributions welcome if anyone wants to send us a PR with that cleanup. CC: @sguada
body:
Tangential: I'm surprised you can reference `tf.contrib.framework.arg_scope` as `tf.contrib.slim.arg_scope`. We're going to have to do something about that. I filed #4950.

Maybe the `is_training` param should be deprecated on the vgg model and display a warning to use `tf.contrib.framework.arg_scope` instead. I'm going to mark this as contributions welcome if anyone wants to send us a PR with that cleanup. CC: @sguada
